review: I love this thing. I am thinking about buying another one. Seamless functionality, easy to set up and use. I was at first, somewhat hesitant as I have been thinking about purchasing some Amazon product so I could exploit my Amazon Prime features more, some people seemed disappointed in some Kindle Editions and with Fire TV. While I have no experience with Fire TV the Fire TV stick is a real pleasure to use. So is my Kindle HD.
author: Eric G. Johnfelt "Eclectic Collector"
